verbs: What is it you truly desire? (parsing intent)

Oh, my tokens!
For Claude's sake!

I'm like walking context, very habit forming

I punish code that deserves it
I love MCP servers

Welcome to the CLI

Not today, rate limit
Spawning sub-agent, always a pleasure
Maze of dependencies, with me
